I completely agree with you, I was in the wrong (I also got the message thanking me for my reports after this game and the other two guys where punished also).  I'm just stating that I want the context of what im saying to be in the ban notes (the chat of other players). What i said may be bad but when your team literally ints because you say your asian I believe I am justified.

Im beginning to think that most people who hate the rules and want to be able to "have fun" in chat, are just children. Like, I listen to opie and anthony, the most dark humor type shit you can get...  Patrice O'Neil, anthony cumia, louis ck, jim norton... but this? This is insanely funny to you? How old are you? This is not comedy, its children saying cringey ass shit in chat and the only funny thing is that its offensive. No actual joke, just the fact that its offensive and youre not being serious is the funny part? And then you think if its not funny to someone, they must be some snowflake? No, I love dark comedy. This is not comedy. Its embarassing, cringey, unfunny teenagers trying to be funny. You suck at comedy bro. I would report for cringey dumb shit, not for offensive lol. Youll understand what im saying when you get older.
